alert.note: Alert for Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 8:29PM PDT until June 22 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Merced County in central California... * Until 900 PM PDT. * At 828 PM PDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Los Banos to 18 miles east of Ridgemark, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Merced County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
